item.title: Scope Review
item.description: Today I was reviewing the concept of scope in Javascript, and thanks to the workshop at nodeschool, I believe I have a better understanding of how scope works. Suppose we are given the following functions: function egg() { var prep = "scrambled"; function bacon() { var amount = 4; } } In this example, the function egg only has access to the variable prep, but the function bacon has access to both variables (i.
